revised_title: Charles Sykes: A Life in Science and Industry
tldr: Charles Sykes was a prominent scientist and industrialist who spent most of his career in the field of metallurgy and physics. He worked for the Metropolitan-Vickers Electrical Co. and the Thomas Firth \& John Brown Co., making significant contributions to research and development. Sykes was also a dedicated educator, serving as a Pro-Chancellor of Sheffield University.
